stimulusHtml: Suppose that  tester  is a properly instantiated reference to a  MyClass  object and  num  is an  int  value. Which of the following best describes the conditions under which the value of the instance variable  x  is unchanged as a result of the call  tester.updateX(num)?

features.html:
Consider the following class definition.

 

public class MyClass 
{
   private int x;
 
   public MyClass(int start)
   {
      x = start;
   }
     
   public void updateX(int amount) 
   { 
      x += amount;
   }
}
